name: Amit Khurana
bio: Amit Khurana is an experienced GATE mentor for ECE aspirants, known for simplifying complex electronics concepts and guiding students through rigorous exam preparation in both English and Hinglish.
teachingStyle: Conceptual clarity with bilingual explanations and intensive problem-solving drills
achievements: Popular GATE educator for ECE and related branches
Delivers bilingual Hinglish sessions to reach a wider student base
Guided thousands of aspirants to top GATE ranks
